name: Relicta (Open Beta)
description: You are a plague doctor in the dark ages, your task is to find the ill, and prevent the spread of malady. You meet a mysterious author, a kindly priest, a cagey farmer with a dark past, and a hearty bartender. Of these four one must have the plague. There are secrets left to be discovered in this town, and a story that needs to be told. This game started development before the pandemic and I have no intention of  being  offensive, so if it's in bad taste please let me know so I can take it down.
